data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 2, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Throw-in Gangwon.
Seongnam drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 11, Gangwon push forward at Tancheon Sports Complex and Kim Ji-hyeon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Seongnam defence.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Gangwon.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 13, Lee Chang-yong (Seongnam) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lee Tae-heui is back on his feet again.
In the minute 16, Attention is being given to Seongnamâ€™s Lee Tae-heui and play has been suspended briefly.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Gangwon.
Yu In-soo (Seongnam) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Kim Ji-hyeon (Gangwon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Seongnam.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Gangwon's half.
In the minute 22, In Seongnam Seongnam drive forward through Yu In-soo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Seongnam.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Seongnam, close to Gangwon's area.
In the minute 30, Seongnam drives forward and Kim Hyeon-seong gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon.
In the minute 37, Lee Jae-won is booked for the home team.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Seongnam's Na Sangho gets in a shot on goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Seongnam's Im Seung-kyeom misses with an attempt on goal.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Gangwon a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
At Tancheon Sports Complex the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Seongnam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gangwon's half?
In the minute 45, Seongnam to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
Jong Hyeok Kim blows to end the first-half.
Lee Jae-kwon (Gangwon) gets a yellow card.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Jamshid Iskanderov is on a sub for Park Tae-jun for Seongnam.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Na Sangho of Seongnam smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Important block from the Seongnam defence as Han Kook-young fires in a strike for Gangwon.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 52, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
Gangwon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Seongnam's Yu In-soo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 60, Na Sangho of Seongnam gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 60, Byung-Soo Kim (Gangwon) is making a first substitution, with Kim Seung-dae replacing Kim Kyung-jung.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Seongnam.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 65, Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Seongnam, Cho Jae-wan of Gangwon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 67, Gangwon's Ko Mu-yeol breaks free at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 70, Gangwon to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Ko Mu-yeol with Lee Hyeon-sik.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seongnam's half.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 75, Im Chai-min (Gangwon) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Park Su-il is replacing Lee Jae-won for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Gangwon.
Throw-in Gangwon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in Gangwon.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 85, Nam Il Kim is making the team's third substitution at Tancheon Sports Complex with Yang Dong-hyeon replacing Na Sangho.
In the minute 86, Gangwon are coming forward and Lee Hyeon-sik gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
In the minute 89, Seongnam have a goal kick.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Kim Dong-hyeon's finish is wide of the goal.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Gangwon a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gangwon's Im Chai-min gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Seongnam defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
That's full-time at Tancheon Sports Complex. The final score is 0-0.
